title: Decodo MCP Server Integration
context:
FEATURE REQUEST: Add Decodo MCP server to Atlas for web browsing capabilities

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Install and configure Decodo MCP server in Atlas
- Update mcp.yaml configuration file 
- Use low-cost model via OpenRouter (Claude Haiku or Chinese model for cost efficiency)
- Enable web browsing/automation capabilities for Atlas
- Follow existing MCP integration patterns (pit_crew, notion)

RESEARCH COMPLETED:
- 16 detailed technical findings on MCP server installation
- 9 sources covering TypeScript integration approaches
- Installation involves Node.js setup, repo cloning, configuration
- Research available at: https://www.notion.so/Research-Decodo-MCP-server-installation-and-configuration-for-TypeScript-applications-2fb780a78eef8154b084ed41a3463393

COST OPTIMIZATION:
- Priority on using budget-friendly models through OpenRouter
- Avoid expensive models like GPT-4 or Claude Opus
- Suggest Claude Haiku or Chinese models for cost efficiency

IMPLEMENTATION NOTES:
- Atlas cannot modify its own mcp.yaml file (workspace limitation)
- Requires Pit Crew configuration changes
- Should expand Atlas capabilities while maintaining cost control
